timeline.message:
Fix OOM during image browsing

Signed-off-by: tobiasKaminsky <tobias@kaminsky.me>

timeline.bodyText:
InputStream indoesn't get closed
closing buffIn and in should probably be handled in a finally block too (like above)
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger

timeline.bodyText: Annotate with @Nullable since return can be null?
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger

replies.bodyText: Totally true, we need to somehow enforce this.
replies.author: tobiasKaminsky
